deploy.startCommand: export JAVA_HOME=$(nix-build '<nixpkgs>' -A openjdk21 --no-out-link 2>/dev/null || find /nix/store -name 'openjdk-21*' -type d 2>/dev/null | head -1 || find /usr/lib/jvm -name '*java*21*' -type d 2>/dev/null | head -1 || echo '') && export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH && java -jar target/umascota-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar
